Hero.description: I am Joseph, a Systems Engineering student at UNAB and a frontend developer passionate about crafting performant, intuitive, and beautiful web experiences with React and Next.js. Currently leading the frontend of my own SaaS project, ChefSync.

jobs.description: Leading the frontend architecture and development of ChefSync, my own SaaS point-of-sale system built with Next.js and React. Created a highly interactive single-page application (SPA) with real-time data updates and full offline capabilities using local-first strategies. Designed and implemented 'ChefManager', a custom hardware integration enabling silent thermal printing directly from the browser via a Python/Flask local server (win32print on Windows, pycups on Linux), supporting ESC/POS text/images and seamless frontend API calls. Architected a unified UI Design System with Tailwind CSS and reusable components, reducing development time by 40%. Built responsive, mobile-first interfaces with a focus on performance, accessibility, and UX best practices. Collaborated on Figma-to-Code workflows, translating complex designs into clean, maintainable TypeScript code. Engineered a Local-First sync engine (Zustand + TanStack Query) achieving 60% faster load times through Vite optimizations and 100% offline uptime.

education.role: Technician in Implementation and Maintenance of Industrial Electronics

Connect.title: Ready to work together?
Connect.description: I am currently open to new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hello, I'll do my best to get back to you!
